title: First sign of the soon to come apocalypse
body:
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/322825856802357249/332311835766161411/Screen_Shot_2017-07-05_at_8.06.27_PM.png

Some may claim photoshop, but this is the true sign!!!!! OPEN YOUR EYES, ILLUMINATI IS HIDING THIS!!

~~its not the troll build i had~~

replies.body:
The first thing I noticed was you on Yasuo having the most honor... But then I realised Riven got the most honors on her team aswell.
What has life come to?
BTW Whenever Janna died I said in all chat "you killed my wind wife".

> [{quoted}](name=Tidal Tyrant,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=TBxg8xwk,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-07-06T00:31:46.916+0000)
>
> The first thing I noticed was you on Yasuo having the most honor... But then I realised Riven got the most honors on her team aswell.
> What has life come to?

Meanwhile Janna is sitting there with her 3/4/42 (hang on wtf 42 assists? And only 4 deaths which is precisely 9 times less than Yasuo's, 4+4 times less than Jhin's, 4 times less than Lee's and 2 times less than Cho's? Holy motherfucking shit!), and maybe getting only 1 honour, at best 2, or maybe even none.

And then there's also Riven on the enemy team with their kda and honour status. 

It's true that kda isn't all there is to it, but then looking at this I can only go "Yeah okay".
I mean, perhaps they were just very positive/friendly or were great shotcalling, this honor system ain't about performance ingame :P

> [{quoted}](name=Tidal Tyrant,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=TBxg8xwk,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2017-07-06T11:06:41.428+0000)
>
> I mean, perhaps they were just very positive/friendly or were great shotcalling, this honor system ain't about performance ingame :P

Maybe.

We are doomed.

PS Nice honor :D
Hey, you're in my ranked division!
Nice summoner name.

CONSULT THE SCROLLS!!!
https://i.makeagif.com/media/12-28-2012/veDixB.gif
I'm missing some joke here.
Well typically, in the elder scroll series, when there is a world ending cataclysm about to take place you, the hero, find a specific scroll and read it to gain the knowledge necessary to prevent it.
even tho in oblivion you dont get an elder scroll ;-;

Was making an assumption, cause in skyrim you read a total of four scrolls (dragon twice)


######only played the one :x
i mean, i didnt know about the end of world whatever, i just liked thinking my character got high off of these
That is an accurate assumption, albeit a magically induced one cx

we dont know that he isnt, maybe these visions he gets are the cause of the visually high, hes still mentally stable, but he halucinates like crazy, thinks its the end of the world, then goes around solitude killing all the guards because they tell you to wait, and that they know you, geez
I have never killed the guards in solitude! The i much prefer the massacre of Markarth :P
my dad racked up an 80k bounty with that one mission, me, i just preffered solitude, its easier to kill them all quicker, less ramps and rivers, less wandering to find that last guard

Just start slaughtering through the masses and when somewhere near the center...
STRUN BAH QO
They will find you, or die trying
well, upside to being blind, i cant see anymore yas's
And it seems lee has little problems with him :P
Your Photoshop skills are impressive
Send noods (you said to ask for them)
ALAS THIS WAS ALL THE WORK OF JANNA SHE BROUGHT TOGETHER THE HONORS AND HAS CREATED MASS HYSTERIA
A riven and a yas getting the most honor heresy.

AP jhin?

i literally thought that this was the point of the thread
Ikr? And he got 15 kills lol

Those 4 Janna deaths.
I can see how it might appear world ending, but I assure you. This does *rarely* happen. ;p
both teams know that you always give yasuo and riven honor for tilt proof, happens to me all the time
Yasuo and Riven are the most honored players in the game? Seems fishy
It was all Jhin's hybrid build ~~kappa~~
liar!
holy shit
You mean yasuo that went 20/13 instead of 13/20 ? Good
I should report you for this build on yasuo ..
You honoured the Janna, right?..... right?
Yasuo carried. (> ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)>
so only new thing about it really is hydra right? which can take advantage off all his aa resets? right? I mean its not bad, but nothing really huge
